reverberate.translation[0].definitions[0: if a loud sound reverberates, it is heard many times as it is sent back from different surfaces
The bang reverberated through the house.
reverberate.translation[0].definitions[1: if a room, building etc reverberates, it seems to shake because of a loud sound
reverberate.translation[0].definitions[2: if an event, action, or idea reverberates, it has a strong effect over a wide area and for a long time
The events of 9/11 will reverberate through history.
